Node.Notes: Uncertain. Maybe instead of S-P it should be P-ADV: [This is] what was from the beginning, what we heard, ... concerning the word of life.

Node.FrameGloss: {A0:of me;of us A1:we have seen;we have heard A2:to you}
{A0:Little children;of me;of us A1:we have known}

Node.Notes: Assumes P ("children of God") from previous clause.
Assumes "the one who does not love his brother [is not of God] because ..."
Assumes: the one in you is greater than the one in the world [is great].
Uncertain as both genitive np and accusative np could be O (yet probably not O and O2). Assumes "he hears us with respect to whatever we ask."
